Spicy Chicken Kale Grain Bowl

9/24/2020
saladmainsauce

Salad Ingredients

  • quinoa
  • chicken
  • kale
  • carrots
  • scallions
  • beets
  • broccoli

Sauce Ingredients

  • 3 tbsp Lime juice
  • 2 tbsp jalapeños juice
  • 1 tsp cilantro
  • 1 clove garlic
  • 3 tbsp white wine vinegar
  • 2 tsp dijon mustard
  • 2 tbsp honey
  • 2 tbsp olive oil.
  • salt
  • pepper
